name: Frost Operative
desc:
Filtered in Liquidation: Frost Operative

Selected while still children, they can only become an "Operative" after many long years of training and teaching, after countless rounds have winnowed the field.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 4 <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> . Attaches <color=#ffffff>Onslaught Stance</color> to this character.
<color=#ece5d8>Onslaught Stance</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deals 1 <color=#ffffff>Piercing DMG</color> to all opposing characters affected by <color=#ffffff>Bond of Life</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds): 2</color>

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
(Passive) <color=#ffffff>After this character uses a Skill:</color> Attach <color=#ffffff>Bond of Life</color> to the opponent's active character with <color=#ffffff>Usage(s)</color> equal to (this Skill's finalized DMG total -2). (Max 5 stacks)
<color=#ece5d8>Bond of Life</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the character to which this is attached is healed:</color> This effect will be consumed once for every <color=#ffffff>Usage(s)</color> it has to negate 1 HP of healing received. (Cannot negate revivals, increases in Max HP, and healing caused by redistribution of HP)
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack, no stack limit).

Applies Cryo and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Melt</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : DMG+1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Frozen</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives Physical or Pyro DMG, in which case they will take +2 DMG)

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Piercing DMG</color>
Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.
<color=#ece5d8>Duration (Rounds)</color>
Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.
This card will be discarded immediately once <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.

customize.name: Frost Operative
customize.desc:
Filtered in Liquidation: Frost Operative

Selected while still children, they can only become an "Operative" after many long years of training and teaching, after countless rounds have winnowed the field.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Frost Operative's Greeting

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow~" "Our Fontainian cat guests often say that the Frost Operatives do not just handle their blades with grace, for they are unfailing in decorum, elegant and gentle. They will always greet cats they meet on the road, and will sometimes even respond to a cat's calls~"
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Frost Operative" starts with the Talent Card "Rimeflow Raiper" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

Frost Operative: Rimeflow Rapier

"Forgive my prior inconsideration."

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Serious Showdown - Frost Operative's Polite Refusal

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow." "However, if there are other monsters about, the frost Operatives will decline a cat's invitation, first disposing of these uninvited guests before returning with suitable gifts in hand..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Frost Operative" starts with the Talent Card "Rimeflow Raiper" equipped, while "Electro Cicin Mage" starts with the Talent Card "Electro Cicin's Gleam" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Fatui Electro Cicin Mage
customize.desc:
Thunder in the Mist: Electro Cicin Mage

...Just as the scent of Mist Grass intoxicates the Electro Cicins, so too does the sadistic mage hanker after the pleasure of toying with her foe...

Complete 3 challenge objective(s) in Frost Operative's Greeting

value.text: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Frost Operative

value.name: Frost Operative
value.desc:
An elite agent among the Fatui.

Selected while still children, they can only become an "Operative" after many long years of training and teaching, after countless rounds have winnowed the field. They are the most outstanding soldiers among the Fatui, with extraordinary skill and unswerving loyalty.
